result.execSummary:
The defendant Merrill Tepper was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Merrill Tepper was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Merrill Tepper is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Stalking, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2).
  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Defamation, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 942.01(1).
  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Defamation, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 942.01(1).
  • Merrill Tepper was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect or through anyone on her behalf, with RM, LJ, JH, SL, KD, BK, KK, DD, SS, SV or their families.   Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with BB, MJG, RCC, DPCF, NAA, SPG, BMG, RMSC, AD or their families, homes or workplaces. No internet use or phone with internet access without prior written approval of agent. No false reports to law enforcement or social services about any person or officer. Not use any other name. Not cause any other person to engage in any ofthe above-proscribed activities on her behalf. Def not to post any statements regarding any of the victims on any medium.

Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified. Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample-prev provided per DCSO.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

1/23/17 Crt signed order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.

Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with BB, MJG, RCC, DPCF, NAA, SPG, BMG, RMSC, AD or their families, homes or work places. No false reports to law enforcement or social services about any person or officer. Def not to post any statements regarding any of the victims on any medium. Def not to cause any other person to engage in any of the above prescribed activities on her behalf.
Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.
